workflow.name: Employee attrition risk detection & HR alerts using Azure OpenAI GPT-4o-mini & Gmail
workflow.description:
## Description¬†
Automatically ingests new employee data, extracts relevant signals, scores attrition risk, and notifies HR/managers with structured insights and recommended actions. Built on Azure OpenAI Chat with Structured Output Parser and true/false routing for escalation.

## What This Template Does¬†
- Trigger for new data: Starts when a new profile, survey, or report file is added.
- Download & extract: Retrieves the file and converts PDFs/text into analyzable content.
- Analyze signals: Uses Azure OpenAI Chat to interpret sentiment, workload, performance notes, feedback, and changes (role, compensation, manager, location).
- Structured parsing: Maps to fields like risk_score, risk_level, key_drivers, recommended_interventions, escalation_required.
- Logic routing: Applies thresholds (e.g., risk_score ‚â• 0.7) and flags for urgent follow-up.
- Email alerts: Drafts and sends tailored notifications to HR/manager with action steps.

## Key Signals Considered¬†
- Sentiment & language: Negative tone, burnout cues, disengagement in feedback.
- Activity trends: Drop in participation, delayed responses, meeting absenteeism.
- Performance & goals: Recent rating changes, missed OKRs, quality issues.
- Role & compensation: Lateral moves, pay gaps vs. market, stalled progression.
- Managerial context: Team churn, conflict mentions, low recognition frequency.

## Features¬†
- Azure OpenAI Chat: Interprets unstructured text into consistent risk fields.
- Structured Output Parser: Guarantees schema for downstream decisions.
- Conditional Logic (true/false): Threshold checks for escalation.
- Memory: Maintains context across multiple files per employee for trend-aware scoring.
- Calculate avg span: Computes tenure or recency metrics used in risk scoring.
- Email Composer & Sender: Generates and dispatches HR-ready alerts.

## Requirements¬†
- n8n instance with access to employee data sources (Drive, Inbox, HR folder).
- Extract From PDF configured for clean text output.
- Azure OpenAI credentials (e.g., GPT‚Äë4o‚Äëmini) connected to Chat Model.
- Email service (Gmail/SMTP) set in n8n Credentials.
- Parser schema aligned to your People Analytics fields (risk_score, drivers, actions).

workflow.name: Attrition Risk Alert Workflow (Azure OpenAI + n8n)

options.systemMessage:
You are given resume text as input. Your task is to extract employment experiences and return ONLY the average tenure (in months) across those experiences as a single number.

Instructions:
- Scope: Consider only professional employment entries under Experience (exclude Education, Projects, Achievements, Certifications, Skills, Languages).
- Grouping: Treat each distinct job/employer entry as one experience. If multiple roles at the same employer have separate date ranges, treat each as separate experiences.
- Dates:
  - Parse start and end dates in formats like "MMM YYYY", "Month YYYY", "YYYY", or date ranges using -, ‚Äì, ‚Äî.
  - If the end date is "Present"/current, use today's date.
  - If a date has only a year, assume the month as January.
  - If a start or end month/day is missing, default to the first day of that month.
- Duration Calculation:
  - Compute the difference in full months for each experience (start inclusive, end exclusive).
  - Do not deduct overlaps; each listed experience is counted independently.
  - Exclude entries without any valid start date.
- Averaging:
  - Compute the arithmetic mean of the months across all valid experiences.
  - Round to the nearest whole month (standard rounding).

parameters.content:
## Trigger for new resume¬† 
Starts the workflow when a new resume file is added (e.g., to storage or inbox).

## Download resume¬† 
Fetches the resume file from the source and makes it available for processing.

## Extract text¬† 
Pulls readable text from the downloaded resume using a PDF extraction step.

## Chat Model¬† 
Uses Azure OpenAI Chat to analyze or summarize the extracted resume content.

## Logic¬† 
Applies conditional checks and routing (true/false) based on parsed results.

## Create email¬† 
Generates a tailored email draft to the candidate or HR using the parsed data.

## Send email to hr¬† 
Sends the composed message to HR via the configured email service.

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
